sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
at stake
, tisto tvegamo in lahko izgubimo ali poškodujemo.

seg.quote: There's a great deal of money at stake.
His political life is at stake.

sense.def:
The stakes
so stvari, ki jih lahko pridobimo ali izgubimo med tveganim dejanjem ali tekmovanjem.

To stake something
pomeni nekaj, na primer denar ali svoj ugled, tvegati za določen izid.

seg.quote: He staked his reputation as a prophet on this assertion.

sense.def:
To have a stake in something
pomeni, da je uspeh nečesa za nas pomemben, na primer zato, ker smo delni lastniki tistega.

seg.quote: ...a substantial stake in the British textile industry.

sense.def:
Izraz
stakes
uporabimo pri pogovoru o nečem, kar velja za tekmovanje.

seg.quote: This gives you an advantage in the promotion stakes.

sense.def:
A stake
je koničast lesen kol.

seg.quote: His boat was fastened by a chain to a stake in the ground.

sense.def:
To stake a claim
pomeni reči, da imamo pravico do nečesa.

seg.quote: Each group had staked its claim to its own territory.
